DOC.brief_summary: Weight loss induce caloric restriction alone ( CR ) exercise alone ( EX ) result similar effect blood glucose insulin . The purpose study assess hypothesis weight loss caloric restriction plus exercise result great improvement glucose tolerance insulin action similar weight loss CR EX alone .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize caloric restriction , exercise , caloric restriction plus exercise weight loss group . Measurements blood glucose insulin , oral glucose tolerance , match glucose infusion do baseline weight loss 6 % body weight . Other test include maximal oxygen uptake ( VO2max ) , strength test , blood pressure , blood lipid , serum inflammatory marker , dual X-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) bone density body composition , physical activity level , dietary intake , measure arterial stiffness .
DOC.criteria: female postmenopausal diabetes , cardiovascular disease , cancer orthopedic problem currently exercise BMI 25 29.9 nonsmoker current regular exerciser premenopausal woman cardiovascular disease , lung disease , cancer , diabetes
